00020 #include "SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser.h"

00029 SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser(ISceneGraphUpdate* updatesRecieverHandle) {
00030         this->updatesRecieverHandle = updatesRecieverHandle;
00031         assert(updatesRecieverHandle != 0);
00032         enableForcedIds = true; // default value
00033         reset();
00034 }
00035 
00036 SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::~SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser() {
00037 
00038 }
00039 
00040 void SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::visit(Node* node) {
00041         unsigned int nodeId = node->getId();
00042         unsigned int parentId;
00043         if(!handleExistingNode(node, parentId)) {
00044                 updatesRecieverHandle->addNode(parentId, nodeId, node->getAttributes(), enableForcedIds);
00045         }
00046 }
00047 
00048 void SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::visit(Group* node) {
00049         unsigned int nodeId = node->getId();
00050         unsigned int parentId;
00051         if(!handleExistingNode(node, parentId)) {
00052                 updatesRecieverHandle->addGroup(parentId, nodeId, node->getAttributes(), enableForcedIds);
00053 //              alreadyVisitedNodes.push_back(node);
00054         }
00055 }
00056 
00057 void SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::visit(Transform* node) {
00058         unsigned int nodeId = node->getId();
00059         unsigned int parentId;
00060         if(!handleExistingNode(node, parentId)) {
00061                 updatesRecieverHandle->addTransformNode(parentId, nodeId, node->getAttributes(), node->getLatestTransform(), node->getLatestTimeStamp(), enableForcedIds);
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::visit(GeometricNode* node) {
00066         unsigned int nodeId = node->getId();
00067         unsigned int parentId;
00068         if(!handleExistingNode(node, parentId)) {
00069                 updatesRecieverHandle->addGeometricNode(parentId, nodeId, node->getAttributes(), node->getShape(), node->getTimeStamp(), enableForcedIds);
00070         }
00071 }
00072 
00073 void SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::reset() {
00074         alreadyVisitedNodesWithPendingStatus.clear();
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::getEnableForcedIds() {
00078     return enableForcedIds;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::setEnableForcedIds(bool enableForcedIds) {
00082     this->enableForcedIds = enableForcedIds;
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 bool SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser::handleExistingNode(Node* node, unsigned int& parentId) {
00087         unsigned int nodeId = node->getId();
00088         vector<Node*> parents;
00089 
00090 
00091         if(alreadyVisitedNodesWithPendingStatus.size() == 0) { //first element of traversal shall be ignored
00092                 LOG(DEBUG) << "SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser: Ignoring root node of traversal.";
00093                 parents.clear();
00094                 alreadyVisitedNodesWithPendingStatus.insert(std::make_pair(node, parents));
00095                 return true;
00096         }
00097 
00098 
00099         parents = node->getParents();
00100         if (parents.size() == 0) { // THE root node
00101                 LOG(DEBUG) << "SceneGraphToUpdatesTraverser: Ignoring root node as it has no parents.";
00102                 return true;
00103         }
00104         Node* potentialParentNode;
00105         assert(parents.size() > 0);
00106         potentialParentNode = parents[0];
00107 
00108 
00109         bool nodeWasAlreadyVisited = false;
00110         alreadyVisitedNodesIterator = alreadyVisitedNodesWithPendingStatus.find(node);
00111         if (alreadyVisitedNodesIterator != alreadyVisitedNodesWithPendingStatus.end()) {
00112                 nodeWasAlreadyVisited = true;
00113         }
00114 
00115         if(nodeWasAlreadyVisited) { // so we add a new parent-child relation to the existin node
00116 
00117                 /*
00118                  * loop over all pending parent IDs and check if it is possible to add parents.
00119                  * If yes remove from pending list
00120                  */
00121                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < alreadyVisitedNodesIterator->second.size(); ++i) {
00122                         Node* parentCandidate = alreadyVisitedNodesIterator->second[i];
00123                         alreadyVisitedAndPendingNodesIterator = alreadyVisitedNodesWithPendingStatus.find(parentCandidate);
00124                         if (alreadyVisitedAndPendingNodesIterator != alreadyVisitedNodesWithPendingStatus.end()) { //for each?
00125                                 updatesRecieverHandle->addParent(nodeId, parentCandidate->getId());
00126                                 alreadyVisitedNodesIterator->second.erase(alreadyVisitedNodesIterator->second.begin() + i);
00127                         }
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 return true;
00131 
00132         } else { // here we need to _create_ the node - which is done outsied the scope of this function, but the caller will be informed be the retured "false"
00133                 parentId = potentialParentNode->getId();
00134                 parents.erase(parents.begin());
00135                 alreadyVisitedNodesWithPendingStatus.insert(std::make_pair(node, parents));
00136                 return false;
00137         }
00138 
00139 }
00140 
00141 }
00142 
00143 }
